edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.blocktransfer

Class BlockOutputStream<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.blocktransfer.BlockOutputStream<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of element
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockStream, AutoCloseable

    public final class BlockOutputStream<T>
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable, BlockStream
    Output stream for block transfer. close() must be called after finishing write. Encodes and flushes outbound data elements to other executors. Three threads are involved.
    • User thread writes elements or FileAreas to this object
    • BlockTransfer.outboundExecutorService encodes elements into ByteBufs
    • Netty EventLoopGroup responds to ChannelOutboundInvoker.writeAndFlush(Object) by sending ByteBufs or FileRegions to the remote executor.
